page.title: 16Weymouth Pavillion.
page.content: {Weymouth Pavillion}is the big building near the{end of the beach by the Quay side.Inside there is a stage where concerts,plays and pantomimes are held.Also in the year{famous stars come down to{Weymouth}to entertain the holiday makers.The main summer star this year is the{Keith Harris Show {with Orville and Cuddles.}Sometimes {Local Groups}put on there own{Shows. On{Sunday afternoon}there is a{Roller {Disco}in the{Ocean Room}of the {Pavillion.}It is Â£1 to get in.You can hire Roller boots.Inside the Ocean Room there are two sections,one for learners and the main ring.In the main ring you have to go round quite fast if you want to keep up with everybody else.Usually a lot of people fall over.While you are skating a D.J.puts records on so you can skate to music. -Nick Horsnell,Susie Thompson.
